aboutSoulTribe.transition: Before delving deeper, let‚Äôs move from the idea of cosmic connection to the community it creates ‚Äî the SoulTribe itself.

soultribe.heading: üå† What Is a SoulTribe?
soultribe.body1: A SoulTribe is not just a network or a list of friends ‚Äî it is a resonance field. It is the invisible web that connects those who share frequency, purpose, and rhythm of spirit. When you meet members of your tribe, recognition is instant: conversation feels like remembering rather than introducing. Time softens its edges, and the space between words becomes sacred.
soultribe.body2: Within your SoulTribe, you are fully seen ‚Äî valued for your essence, not your image. Each person becomes a mirror: some reflect your strengths, others your lessons, and a few remind you of what you are capable of becoming. They awaken courage, authenticity, and the knowing that belonging is not about similarity but resonance.
soultribe.body3: Your tribe may consist of artists, dreamers, healers, scientists, or quiet souls walking their truth. What unites you is not background or belief ‚Äî it is vibration.

power.heading: üî• The Power of a Tribe
power.body1: Just as every SoulTribe forms through shared resonance, its true strength emerges in the collective energy that grows from those connections.
power.body2: We grow faster, heal deeper, and dream bigger when we are witnessed by others walking beside us. Humans have always thrived in circles ‚Äî it is our ancient design. A tribe magnifies energy: what one sparks, another sustains; what one dreams, another grounds. In this shared field, synchronicities multiply and collective evolution accelerates.
power.body3: As you engage, you may notice how your own energy expands. Ideas find momentum, creativity flows, intuition sharpens. The tribe becomes a mirror, a teacher, and a circle of empowerment ‚Äî reminding you that the path of the soul was never meant to be walked alone.
power.body4: Within SoulTribe.chat, the idea of a ‚Äútribe‚Äù is not about exclusivity but synergy. Here, individuality and togetherness coexist beautifully. Each person contributes their frequency, forming a living constellation of consciousness ‚Äî each point of light illuminating the others.

astro.heading: ‚òÄÔ∏è Astro & Soul
astro.body1: Astrology on SoulTribe.chat bridges insight and connection while honoring your privacy and consent. Only essential birth data is used to generate compatibility insights, and nothing is shared or stored beyond what‚Äôs needed for your experience.
astro.body2: Using your birth details, the platform calculates planetary positions and compares them with others to reveal areas of natural harmony, emotional resonance, and potential growth. Instead of overwhelming users with data, results are distilled into clear indicators of compatibility ‚Äî showing where energies align and how relationships can evolve.
astro.body3: This is not dating by sign; it is soul resonance by design, where charts guide understanding and connection. Whether the outcome is romantic chemistry, creative collaboration, or a deep friendship, SoulTribe.chat helps you recognize why certain people feel instantly familiar ‚Äî and how every meeting becomes a mirror for your soul.

soulmates.heading: üí´ Soulmates and Beyond
soulmates.body1: The word soulmate often narrows the imagination to romance, but soulmates appear in many forms. They can be the friend who reawakens your laughter, the teacher who challenges your limits, or the stranger whose presence feels instantly familiar. SoulTribe.chat expands this idea ‚Äî guiding you not to ‚Äúthe one,‚Äù but to the many who carry pieces of your evolution.

Each meeting is a step toward wholeness, a reminder that the soul‚Äôs journey is a mosaic of sacred encounters. To meet your tribe is to meet yourself ‚Äî reflected in a thousand living mirrors.

guestGuide.title: SoulTribe Jitsi guest quick-start
guestGuide.intro: This guide helps first-time guests join SoulTribe Jitsi rooms with confidence. Pick only the steps you need. Text, audio, and video are all optional.

prejoin.heading: Before you join

steps.options: Learn what is available. Jitsi supports text chat, audio, and video. You decide what to enable, and each channel can remain off.
steps.permissions: Grant the requested permissions. When the login page asks for access, allow your browser to use the microphone and camera so you can turn them on later.
steps.setup: Take a moment to get set up before you enter the room.

substeps.name: Name: enter how you would like to appear to other participants.
substeps.background: Background: choose blur or a virtual background if you want extra privacy.

prejoin.mic_camera_text: Use the first two buttons to toggle your mic and camera before you join.
prejoin.devices_before_arrow: Open the small arrow next to each device control
prejoin.devices_after_arrow: and select the microphone or webcam you want to use.
prejoin.audio_tip_text: A headset or headphones helps avoid echo. If you must use speakers, keep the volume low to prevent feedback.

browser.heading: Browser compatibility
browser.supported: Firefox and Chrome offer full support for audio, video, and chat.
browser.unsupported: Safari, Edge, Opera, Brave, and DuckDuckGo are not supported at this time.
browser.note: Other niche browsers have not been verified.
browser.tip1: If prompted, allow microphone and camera access from the address bar.
browser.tip2: Disable tracker blockers or add Jitsi to your allow list.
browser.tip3: Reload the tab after changing permissions so the updates take effect.

layout.heading: Room interface overview
layout.description: The main video area in the center shows everyone who currently has their camera on. Along the bottom, the control bar holds the key icons for microphone, camera, screen share, chat, participants, and other options. The panel on the right opens the participant list and any shared screens.

microphone.label: Microphone
microphone.description: Toggle your microphone and choose the device you want to use.

camera.label: Camera
camera.description: Turn your camera on or off and select the correct video source.

screen.label: Screen share
screen.description: Share your entire screen, a specific tab, or a window.

chat.label: Chat
chat.description: Open the text chat to send messages or share links.

participants.label: Participants / Invite
participants.description: See who is in the room, invite others, and admit guests who are waiting.

more.label: More options
more.description: Access security settings, device preferences, and additional tools.

hangup.label: Leave
hangup.description: End the call and exit the room.

quick.heading: Quick join link
quick.note: Test your setup or meet friendly guests. No account is required.

closing.heading: Closing note
closing.text: Enjoy connecting in the way and at the pace that works best for you.

nextStepsGuide.title: Detailed Next Steps Guide
nextStepsGuide.intro: This guide expands the landing page steps and walks you through each action with tips and links.

step1.heading: Create an account
step1.description: Register with your email to access your dashboard and profile. No social logins required.

bullets.item1: Use a valid email; verification links expire after 24 hours.
bullets.item2: After confirming, you'll be redirected to login.

step2.heading: Fill your profile
step2.description: Add your birth details to enable resonance-based matching. Approximate birth time is fine; more accurate improves results.

bullets.item1: Enter birth date, time, and place. If you don't know the exact time, pick an estimate.
bullets.item2: Write a short intro that reflects your interests and intentions. Be specific and genuine.

step2.callout: Tip: Your profile timezone is detected automatically; you can review it in your dashboard.

step3.heading: Create a time slot
step3.description: Offer one or more time slots when you'd be open to connect. We store your local time and convert to UTC for scheduling.

bullets.item1: Pick a start time in your local timezone; choose a duration (e.g., 1‚Äì3 hours).
bullets.item2: Adding slots on multiple days increases the chance of quick matches.

step3.callout: Timezone aware: We handle conversions between your local time and UTC automatically (UTC¬±HH:MM).

step4.heading: Watch out for matches
step4.description: Browse suggested matches based on resonance. Check compatibility notes and shared interests.

bullets.item1: New suggestions appear as your profile and slots are available.
bullets.item2: Use filters and notes to track who you'd like to contact.

step4.callout: Privacy first: Your details remain private. You choose when and how to engage.

step5.heading: Propose a meetup or confirm
step5.description: When interest is mutual, propose a time within overlapping slots or accept a proposal from your match.

bullets.item1: Send a friendly, specific invitation. Suggest one or two time windows.
bullets.item2: Confirm the plan in chat, then move to a call when both are ready.

step5.callout: Consent and comfort: move at your own pace. It's okay to keep it text-only.

step6.heading: Join the Jitsi chat
step6.description: Use Jitsi for optional voice/video. Desktop browsers (Firefox, Chrome) are supported. Text chat is always available.

bullets.item1: Test mic/camera, or keep them off and use text only.
bullets.item2: Pick the right devices via the small arrow next to mic/cam icons.

nextStepsGuide.closing: Enjoy connecting in a way that feels right for you.
